atoms.text: The Twelve Days of Christmas ... in most of the Western Church are the twelve days from Christmas until the beginning of Epiphany (January 6th ; the 12 days count from December 25th until January 5th ).

contexts.text: Some households exchange gifts on the first ( 25 December ) and last ( 5 January ) days of the Twelve Days.
In these traditions , the twelve days begin December 26 ( th ) and include Epiphany on January.
